statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_audit WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, action_description FROM user_activity_audit WHERE activity = 'login';
SELECT activity, action_timestamp FROM user_activity_audit WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT user_id, activity, action_timestamp FROM user_activity_audit WHERE action_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity, action_description FROM user_activity_audit WHERE activity LIKE '%logout%';
SELECT user_id, activity, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_activity_audit WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT activity, user_id, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_activity_audit WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activity_audit WHERE activity LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity) AS activity_count FROM user_activity_audit GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_audit ORDER BY user_id ASC, action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, action_taken, audit_date FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT user_id, AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW() - activity_date)) AS avg_days_since_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_days_since_activity DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT u.user_id, a.action_taken FROM user_activity u JOIN audit_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%'
SELECT * FROM user_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM compliance_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description ILIKE '%login%' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT user_audit.user_id, user_audit.audit_action, user_audit.audit_timestamp, user_activity.activity_timestamp FROM user_audit INNER JOIN user_activity ON user_audit.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_audit.audit_action = 'login' ORDER BY user_audit.audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(log_timestamp) AS last_log_timestamp FROM compliance_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, full_name FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM login_activity ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, ip_address FROM login_activity WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT activity_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_text FROM compliance_requirements WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, full_name FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, l.login_time, l.ip_address FROM users u INNER JOIN login_activity l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.action, a.timestamp FROM users u INNER JOIN login_activity l ON u.user_id = l.user_id INNER JOIN audit_log a ON l.activity_id = a.activity_id ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions;
SELECT user_id, login_time, location FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, compliance_score FROM compliance_logs WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT trail_id, user_id, action_time FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT compliance_id, user_id, compliance_type FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT session_id, login_time, location FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, compliance_score, notes FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY action_time DESC;
SELECT trail_id, user_id, action, details FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'login' AND session_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY action_time ASC;
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_type, compliance_date, compliance_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_date;
